Sinopses: While shooting a movie in Los Angeles about the abused wife Sarah Jennings that has converted to Christian and her husband Francis Burns that misses their orgies, the New Yorker director Eddie Israel pushes his lead actor and actress to the edge affecting their real lives. Eddie has one brief affair with Sarah but he feels also affected by his work and confesses the truth about his many infidelities to his wife Mad Israel (Nancy Ferrara), blurring fiction and reality and destroying his marriage.  Written by Claudio Carvalho, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
